svg.text: GGE Data Center - Electrical Single-Line Diagram
10kV MV Distribution | MTM Topology | 2N DRUPS Backup | Tier III | Tbilisi, Georgia
• Tier III: 2N DRUPS backup, N+1 mechanical
• MTM topology at MV (10kV) and LV (400V)
• IT loads: Dual-corded (Path A + Path B)
N.C. (Normally Closed - RED label centered below)
N.O. (Normally Open - Gray label centered below)
All breakers: ID centered above, state centered below
